version_description:
Fixed bugs:
- Status bar being invisible when the device is in dark mode and the terminal has a light background

Fixed bugs:
- Status bar being invisible when the device is in dark mode and the terminal has a light background

- Fixes for some of the top crashes since launch
- Upside-down orientation is disabled to match other apps on notchless iPhones

- Fixes for some of the top crashes since launch
- Upside-down orientation is disabled to match other apps on notchless iPhones

Fixed bugs:
- Crash when entering recovery mode
- Other KVO-related crashes
- Incorrect syntax for multiple DNS search domains in resolv.conf (thanks @mitchblank)
- Broken seek in procfs, causing many things dependent on it to hang
- Directory traversal in filesystem renaming

Fixed bugs:
- Crash when entering recovery mode
- Other KVO-related crashes
- Incorrect syntax for multiple DNS search domains in resolv.conf (thanks @mitchblank)
- Broken seek in procfs, causing many things dependent on it to hang
- Directory traversal in filesystem renaming

New stuff:
- apk has been added. You can use it install Alpine packages! If you're updating from an earlier version, you'll need to manually activate it it: https://go.ish.app/get-apk

Fixed bugs:
- Unable to cd to /proc/pid/fd in the shell

New stuff:
- apk has been added. You can use it install Alpine packages! If you're updating from an earlier version, you'll need to manually activate it it: https://go.ish.app/get-apk

Fixed bugs:
- Unable to cd to /proc/pid/fd in the shell

New stuff:
- apk has been added. You can use it install Alpine packages! If you're updating from an earlier version, you'll need to manually activate it it: https://go.ish.app/get-apk

Fixed bugs:
- Unable to cd to /proc/pid/fd in the shell

New stuff:
- apk has been added. You can use it install Alpine packages! If you're updating from an earlier version, you'll need to manually activate it it: https://go.ish.app/get-apk

Fixed bugs:
- Unable to cd to /proc/pid/fd in the shell

New stuff:
- Updated Alpine repositories
- Added some more icons
- Can use fonts installed via profile on iOS 14

Fixed bugs:
- Crash when running `ps` many times in parallel (thanks @emkey1)
- Titles missing in some settings pages
- OOM when too much is outputted to the terminal (fixed by slowing down terminal output)

New stuff:
- Updated Alpine repositories
- Added some more icons
- Can use fonts installed via profile on iOS 14

Fixed bugs:
- Crash when running `ps` many times in parallel (thanks @emkey1)
- Titles missing in some settings pages
- OOM when too much is outputted to the terminal (fixed by slowing down terminal output)
iSH now uses its own infrastructure for APK downloads instead of on-demand resources, making downloads more reliable and user-friendly.
iSH now uses its own infrastructure for APK downloads instead of on-demand resources, making downloads more reliable and user-friendly.

Fixed bugs:
- Any text containing non-ASCII characters would disappear on iOS 14.5 or later
New stuff:
- Updated Alpine repositories to the latest as of 2021-05-29

Fixed bugs:
- Any text containing non-ASCII characters would disappear on iOS 14.5 or later
New stuff:
- Updated Alpine repositories to the latest as of 2021-05-29

New stuff:
- Added an option to hide the status bar
- Updated Alpine repositories to the latest as of 2021-06-25
Fixed bugs:
- Significantly improve launch performance

New stuff:
- Added an option to hide the status bar
- Updated Alpine repositories to the latest as of 2021-06-25
Fixed bugs:
- Significantly improve launch performance
